content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Technology Consultant (TC)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a role assigned to a hands-on expert in multiple technologies and business domains who keeps abreast of emerging technologies and influence strategic decisions regarding the technical direction of the business.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For Technology Consultants, their main role and work process are described at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/whoisTC\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who is Technology Consultant KB\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Technology Consultant can fulfill a wide range of responsibilities. Because of this, the TC career expectations around those responsibilities are distributed across 2 different career paths and qualification Levels from 1 through 5:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1) Technology Consultant career track:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" a full-time Technology Consultant who is responsible for building the Technology Strategy and/or its parts in tight relation with the organization Business Strategy, supporting it with full-scale transformation for Technology Architecture and Technology Organization. Such person also has some level of depth in one or more areas below:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Architecture\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Management\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Product Management\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Domain/Industry\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This career path is available from B3+ level. In order to grow in TC career track, please check\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/tc-gcf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" TC Global Competency Framework \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"as well as \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/CTOOCC/Assessment+of+Technology+Consultants\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assessment of Technology Consultants\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2) SME-Technology Consultant career track\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": can switch from primary role, Architect (of any type - Solution Architect, System Architect, Security Architect, etc.) or Delivery Manager, to a secondary role of Technology Consultant. Such person can drive Architecture or Delivery and/or contribute to all key Technology Consulting activities/artifacts, including driving some of them.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This career path is available from B2+ level.  In order to grow in SME-Consultant career track, please apply for your regular Assessment according to your Job Function (e.g., Architecture / Delivery Management Assessment, though your committee will be extended with Technology Consultants who will share their opinion on your readiness for promotion and giving feedback for further growth for -Consultant title). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The title of Technology Consultant can be granted only by an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/Assessment\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assessment \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"committee’s recommendation, with the subsequent approval of Job Function change by EPAM CTO. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":340557,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d62edf5-8854-4aa6-9d3b-147139108cbe/image2021-2-25_13-39-23.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d62edf5-8854-4aa6-9d3b-147139108cbe/image2021-2-25_13-39-23.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2021-2-25_13-39-23.png\",\"name\":\"image2021-2-25_13-39-23.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7d62edf5-8854-4aa6-9d3b-147139108cbe\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":525.4084060269627},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
